Good fragrance, very moist.The real leaf is attached to the mask. Good fragrance, very moist.The real leaf is attached to the mask. Review Title: I think this mask is going to be too good to be a Mothers Day gift Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: [ANSWER NINETEEN+] THEMOIST SENSITIVE ESSENCE - Deep Moisturizing, Soothing Effect for The Sensitive Skin. Natural Superfood Ingredients, Panthenol (Vitamin B5), Beta Glucan, Hyaluronic Acid, 55ml Review Date: 2018/05/24 Store: ANSWER NINETEEN+ Average Rating: 5.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'ANSWER NINETEEN+', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Count', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Item Volume': '55 Milliliters', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.46 x 1.46 x 5.31 inches; 3.53 Ounces'} Review Text: I used to buy korean brand- skinfood lettuce essence, but I always so wanted to get a other essence.
Because I used one kind so - long time.
This essence makes my skin so hydrating and glowing. Also, its very mild.
I always love to use Korean cosmetic brands.
My families and friends are always try to used Korean brands because their ingredients are safe to use.
I would recommend this to my family and friends. Review Title: I always love to use Korean cosmetic brands Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: [ANSWER NINETEEN+] THEMOIST SENSITIVE CREAM - Deep Moisturizing, Soothing Effect for The Sensitive Skin. Natural Superfood Ingredients, Panthenol (Vitamin B5), Beta Glucan, Hyaluronic Acid, 70ml Review Date: 2018/05/24 Store: ANSWER NINETEEN+ Average Rating: 5.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'ANSWER NINETEEN+', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Count', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Combination, Sensitive, Dry, acne-prone, Normal', 'Item Volume': '70 Milliliters', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.64 x 2.64 x 1.85 inches; 4.83 Ounces'} Review Text: This cream is good for all skin type for sure.
I have sensitive skin and oily.
I applied it on my clean face and then applied base makeup.
OMG it makes my skin look so much better than my old moisturizer.
I would like to get it again !! Review Title: This cream is good for all skin type for sure Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The purchase history indicates a strong preference for high-quality skincare products, particularly from Korean brands, which emphasize natural ingredients and gentle formulations. The individual consistently rates products highly, often favoring those with soothing and hydrating properties, evidenced by multiple purchases of sheet masks and moisturizing essences/creams.

Common themes include a focus on anti-aging benefits, moisture retention, and mildness for sensitive skin. The buyer appreciates products with botanical elements, specifically those containing real plant extracts like mugwort and chrysanthemum, which enhances the sensory experience and perceived effectiveness.

Quality is a paramount consideration, as the individual has selected products with high ratings and positive sentiments across reviews, expressing satisfaction with product efficacy and texture. There is also a tendency towards purchasing items that are perceived as thoughtful gifts, indicating an inclination towards gifting quality beauty products to loved ones.

While explicit price sensitivity isn’t outlined, the choice of reputable brands suggests a willingness to invest in products viewed as superior in formulation and safety. Overall, this individual clearly favors effective, gentle skincare that aligns with current trends in natural beauty and wellness, while also valuing the social aspect of skincare through gifting.
